name: Deploy
description: Triggers when the card is played.

name: Activate
description: An ability that can be used once, after the first turn.

name: Recharge
description: Re-enable the active ability.

name: Haste
description: The card can be activated on the turn it is played.

name: Equip
description: Triggers when the equipment is assigned to a unit.

name: Summon
description: Move a card to the battlefield, bypassing its deploy ability.

name: Resurrect
description: Play a card from graveyard and give it Doomed.

name: Tutor
description: Search for and play a card from deck.

name: Mana
description: An elemental resource used to trigger abilities.

name: Expend X
description: Triggers if X mana dice are rerolled.

name: Conjure
description: Turn a number of mana dice to the indicated faces.

name: Reroll X
description: Reroll X common or allied mana dice.

name: Rally X
description: Add X points to your score.

name: Rout X
description: Subtract X points from your score.

name: Score
description: The running total of points gained from Rally or lost from Rout.

name: Turnwise
description: Triggers while on the battlefield, each allied turn start.

name: Boost X
description: Increase the unit's power by X.

name: Protect
description: Prevent a unit from being targeted by hostile abilities.

name: Protected
description: Triggers if the card is under the protection of an ally.

name: Vulnerable
description: The card cannot receive protection.

name: Deflect
description: The targeted card no longer protects any units.

name: Assault X
description: Destroy an enemy unit of X or less power.

name: Assassinate X
description: Assault X, bypassing Protection.

name: Destroy
description: Move a card from the battlefield to the graveyard.

name: Reflex
description: Triggers when an adjacent unit is destroyed.

name: Banish
description: Remove a card from the game. Does not trigger Expire.

name: Overkill X
description: Triggers if an assault or assassination exceeds the target's power by at least X.

name: Seize X
description: Move a unit of X or less power to it's opponents battlefield.

name: Armor
description: Increases resistance to Assault or Assassinate abilities.

name: Expire
description: Triggers when the card is Destroyed.

name: Finale
description: Triggers when you pass.

name: Disloyal
description: The card is played to your opponent's battefield.

name: Chaos X
description: Triggers if there are at least X unique mana types.

name: Imbibe
description: Triggers when a Liquor card is equipped to the unit.

name: Bonded
description: Triggers if you control more than one copy of this card.

name: Echo
description: If this card is in your graveyard at the start of the round, move to the top of your deck and become Doomed before drawing cards.

name: Lock
description: Status that disables all of a card's abilities.

name: Poison
description: A unit is destroyed if it receives two instances of this status.

name: Immune
description: Status that prevents the unit from receiving additional statuses.

name: Invisible
description: Status that prevents the unit from being targeted by hostile abilities.

name: Stalwart
description: Status that allows the unit to remain on the battlefield after the round ends.

name: Purify
description: Remove all statuses from a unit.
